name: FORM Clock Widget
tagline: A homescreen widget port of Roman Nurik's FORM watch face.
body:
This is a home screen clock widget, ported from Roman Nurik's gorgeous FORM Watch Face for Android Wear.

The widget uses the typeface design for FORM, Google's first design conference. For more on FORM, see http://google.com/design/form

[The config app in landscape on a Nexus 7 (2012).](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-XisWBjJ4vsE/VYmJMD2E8dI/AAAAAAAAjTo/u0_1AT6TPQo/w1280-h800-no/2015-06-23%2B16.03.26.png)

In the companion settings app you can choose your widget colours or let the widget colour itself based on your current wallpaper. On Android Kitkat and above, you can choose to have the widget animate when the time changes. Please note that enabling animation may cause performance issues including increased battery consumption!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
